an9.25:1.1: “Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pannaya cittam suparicitam hoti, tassetam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno kallam vacanaya:
an9.25:1.2: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami’ti.
an9.25:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pannaya cittam suparicitam hoti?
an9.25:2.2: ‘Vitaragam me cittan’ti pannaya cittam suparicitam hoti;
an9.25:2.3: ‘vitadosam me cittan’ti pannaya cittam suparicitam hoti;
an9.25:2.4: ‘vitamoham me cittan’ti pannaya cittam suparicitam hoti;
an9.25:2.5: ‘asaragadhammam me cittan’ti pannaya cittam suparicitam hoti;
an9.25:2.6: ‘asadosadhammam me cittan’ti pannaya cittam suparicitam hoti;
an9.25:2.7: ‘asamohadhammam me cittan’ti pannaya cittam suparicitam hoti;
an9.25:2.8: ‘anavattidhammam me cittam kamabhavaya’ti pannaya cittam suparicitam hoti;
an9.25:2.9: ‘anavattidhammam me cittam rupabhavaya’ti pannaya cittam suparicitam hoti;
an9.25:2.10: ‘anavattidhammam me cittam arupabhavaya’ti pannaya cittam suparicitam hoti.
an9.25:2.11: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pannaya cittam suparicitam hoti, tassetam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno kallam vacanaya:
an9.25:2.12: ‘khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami’”ti.
